name: Vocabulary Builder
description: Expand your vocabulary with word lists, flashcards, and quizzes.

name: Grammar Exercises
description: Practice different grammar concepts with interactive exercises.

name: Pronunciation Guides
description: Improve your pronunciation with audio clips and phonetic transcriptions.

name: Conversation Simulations
description: Practice conversations in real-life scenarios with interactive dialogues.

name: Writing Prompts
description: Enhance your writing skills with interesting prompts and exercises.

name: Language Quizzes and Games
description: Test your language knowledge and have fun with interactive quizzes and games.

name: Cultural Exploration
description: Explore the culture of the language you're learning with interactive tools.

name: Language Exchange Forums
description: Connect with other learners for language exchange through discussion forums and chat rooms.
